data.eml:eml: The Afrotropical ponerine ant genus Asphinctopone Santschi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolton, Barry, Fisher, Brian L. (2008): The Afrotropical ponerine ant genus Asphinctopone Santschi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 1827: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274404
